column1: in memory of nat -- coltrin mortuary| nat. june 18
column8: at his home surrounded by his family. he was under the care of aspen home health and hospice. he is survived by his wife
column35: 7 grandchildren and 2 great-grandchildren. he was preceded in death by both parents
column39: andrew schroder and bob markin. funeral services will be held at 11:00 a. m.
column46: the family will visit with friends one hour prior to services on wednesday. burial will be in fielding memorial park cemetery. condolences may be sent to the family at www. coltrinmortuary. com.
